about.title: About Muajjin
about.description: A lightweight, privacy-friendly Islamic salat times app

features.accurate: Accurate salat time calculation based on location
features.location: Automatic GPS location with IP-based fallback
features.countdown: Current salat highlighting and next salat countdown
features.ramadan: Suhoor and Iftar times for Ramadan
features.theme: Automatic light and dark theme support
features.privacy: Salat times calculated locally—no tracking, no remote APIs

about.philosophyDesc: This app is designed with a minimal feature philosophy. The focus is intentionally narrow: salat times and saum times only. Any additional features beyond these core functions will not be implemented.
about.appDescription: Muajjin is your comprehensive Islamic salat times application that provides accurate salat times, Hijri calendar information, and Ramadan timings.

sections.salatTimesDesc: The main screen displays the daily salat times based on your location and calculation method settings.
sections.salatTimesList1: Salat times are calculated based on your location and preferred calculation method
sections.salatTimesList2: Jama'ah times can be customized in the settings
sections.salatTimesList3: Time adjustments for Suhoor and Iftar can be set in the salat times tab
sections.locationDesc: You can set your location in two ways:
sections.locationList1: Manual coordinates: Enter latitude and longitude directly
sections.locationList2: City and country: Select your city and country from the dropdown
sections.calculationMethodsDesc: Different regions follow different calculation methods:
sections.calculationMethodsList1: Select the calculation method that is followed in your region
sections.calculationMethodsList2: Choose the appropriate Madhab for Asr salat time calculation
sections.calculationMethodsList3: Adjust the Hijri date if needed to match local moon sighting
sections.jamaahTimesDesc: Set the Jama'ah salat times for your local mosque:
sections.jamaahTimesList1: Enter the exact time for each salat's Jama'ah
sections.jamaahTimesList2: These times will be displayed alongside the calculated salat times
